creator: vincent.hardy@sun.com
text:
<script type="text/ecmascript"><![CDATA[
   function test(evt){
      evt.getTarget().setAttributeNS(null, "class", "newClass");
   }
]]>
</script>

<defs>
   <rect id="rect" width="30" height="30" />
</defs>

<use xlink:href="#rect" x="200" y="200" onclick="test(evt)"/>
